com.cubeia.firebase.api.game.table
Interface TablePlayerSet

public interface TablePlayerSet

This is the interface to the collection of players currently associated with the table (seated). It contains references to player objects and a map over the current seating.

A player should only ever exist once per set.

Author:
lars.j.nilsson

Method Detail

getPlayerCount

int getPlayerCount()
THis method is equivalent to the collections "size" method, and returns the number of player at the table.

Returns:
The number of players at the table

removePlayer

void removePlayer(int playerId)
This method removes a player at the table. It fails silently if the player is not found in the set.

Parameters:
playerId - PLayer to remove

addPlayer

void addPlayer(GenericPlayer player,
               int seat)
Add a player at a specific seat. If another player is referenced at the seat it will be removed, but remain in the set, which may not be intended.

Parameters:
player - Player to add, must not be null
seat - Seat id, indexed from zero

getPlayers

UnmodifiableSet<GenericPlayer> getPlayers()
Get all players in an unmodifiable set.

Returns:
A set of all players, never null

getPlayer

GenericPlayer getPlayer(int playerId)
Get a player object reference by id.

Parameters:
playerId - Player id
Returns:
A player object, or null if not found

getSeatingMap

TableSeatingMap getSeatingMap()
Get a map over the table seating.

Returns:
The table seating map, never null

unseatPlayer

void unseatPlayer(int playerId)

This is a utility method for manually unseating a player at a table

This method will:
  • Notify all players at the table of the removal (NotifyLeavePacket)
  • Remove the player-table association from the client registry
  • Remove the player from the playerset
Note the following:
  • The table interceptor will not be called
  • The table listener will not be called
  • There will not be a leave response packet sent to the removed player/client

No notification is sent out to the player that is seated. If you wish to notify the seated player then you must send a custom message using send to client in the table notifier.

Parameters:
playerId -
